text:
I'm looking forward to seeing
Hana-chan in costume too~

Yeah, I’ll get all made up
with lots of effort.

......It feels weird,
different from when we're CoMETIK──!

Yeah,
everything around us is pastel and fluffy...!

We have to give our all to express "cute" so we
don't get overshadowed by the set and costumes...!

Okay, both of you,
snuggle up and look this way!
